input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Timex Men's Watch North Field Post'
  - Name='Timex Expedition Metal Field Full-Size Watch with Brown Leather'
  - Name='Timex Expedition North Field Post Solar Waterproof Watch'
  - Name='Timex Men's Expedition Scout Watch'
  - Name='Timex Men's Expedition Scout Watch TW4B23000'
  - Name='Timex Men's Expedition Field Solar Analog Watch'
  - Name='Men's T49905 Timex Expedition Field Watch'
  - Name='Men's Seiko 5 Sports Automatic Field Watch'
  - Name='Fossil FS5751 Gents Watch - Latitude'
  - Name='Casio Men's G-Shock Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Sports SRPD65 Automatic Watch'
  - Name='FS4835 Men's Fossil Grant Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Fenmore Multifunction Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Bronson Chronograph Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Windfield Multifunction Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Automatic Black Leather Watch'
  - Name='Men's Casio Watch MTP-M305'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Grant Chronograph Watch'
  - Name='Skagen Men's SKW6360 Stainless Steel Chronograph Watch'
  - Name='Hamilton Khaki Field Quartz'
  - Name='Men's Citizen Chronograph Eco-Drive Black Watch CA4505-80L'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Promaster Navihawk Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Series8 890 Automatic Men's Watch NB6060-58L'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Promaster Navihawk A-T AT8227-56X'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Promaster Tough'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Watch North Field Post
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This Timex watch is a field-style timepiece similar to the Expedition line, likely sharing similar rugged features and intended for outdoor use, though not specified as titanium or 200m water resistant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Expedition Metal Field Full-Size Watch with Brown Leather
scores_with_rationales.rationale: As part of the Timex Expedition series with a metal case and leather strap, this product closely aligns with the reference in function, style, and materials, though titanium construction is not mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Expedition North Field Post Solar Waterproof Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also in the Timex Expedition field category, solar powered and waterproof; shares ruggedness and utility focus, but solar power and exact materials differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Expedition Scout Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This watch matches the reference product name exactly, indicating it is the same or near-identical model with the same features and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Expedition Scout Watch TW4B23000
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact same model name including SKU, indicating a perfect match to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Expedition Field Solar Analog Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Part of the Expedition line with field style and solar power, but solar quartz and potentially different materials; slightly less direct match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's T49905 Timex Expedition Field Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another Timex Expedition field watch likely sharing rugged design and purpose, though titanium and other exact features not specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Seiko 5 Sports Automatic Field Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A Seiko automatic field watch shares the field watch category and rugged intent but has different movement type and brand characteristics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil FS5751 Gents Watch - Latitude
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A Fossil watch likely more fashion-oriented with less emphasis on ruggedness, titanium, or field watch features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's G-Shock Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: G-Shock is known for toughness and durability somewhat similar to the Timex Expedition's rugged intent, but G-Shock watches have distinct design and materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's 5 Sports SRPD65 Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to the other Seiko 5 sports watch: automatic movement field/sports watch but less aligned in materials and brand category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: FS4835 Men's Fossil Grant Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a classic fashion watch with chronograph features, less relevance to rugged titanium field watch category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Fenmore Multifunction Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fashion multifunction watch in stainless steel not closely related to rugged, titanium, field watch concept.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Bronson Chronograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Again, a fashion-forward chronograph less aligned to the rugged outdoor field watch niche.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Windfield Multifunction Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fashion multifunction watch with no clear rugged or titanium features relevant to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Automatic Black Leather Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A high-quality automatic watch with leather strap, but probably more dress-oriented than rugged field watch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Casio Watch MTP-M305
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Basic Casio watch model likely more casual or dress than rugged outdoor field watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Grant Chronograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fashion chronograph less related to rugged field watch style or titanium construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Men's SKW6360 Stainless Steel Chronograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Minimalist fashion chronograph watch, not focused on outdoor or rugged features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Quartz
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly relevant as a quartz field watch from a reputable brand with rugged design and outdoor intent, similar function and style to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Citizen Chronograph Eco-Drive Black Watch CA4505-80L
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Citizen Eco-Drive chronograph shares rugged build and outdoor functionality, but chronograph function differs from simple field watch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Promaster Navihawk Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-function aviation watch with many complications, less minimalist field watch style and titanium features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Series8 890 Automatic Men's Watch NB6060-58L
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An automatic watch from Citizen Series8 line likely more urban/dress than rugged titanium field watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Promaster Navihawk A-T AT8227-56X
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to other Navihawk watch, more aviation and tech-focused than the simple rugged field watch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Promaster Tough
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Citizen's Promaster Tough is a rugged, outdoor-focused watch potentially with titanium construction and strong water resistance, closely aligned with Timex Expedition Titanium features.
